Name: Team Size Lower Bound
Description: Each Team must have at least 3 members

Name: Team Size Upper Bound
Description: No more than 9 members per Team

Name: Sprint Length Fixed
Description: Sprint duration must be exactly 14 days

Name: Budget Floor
Description: Project Budget must be â‰¥ sum of allocated Feature costs

Name: Skill Coverage
Description: All required Skills for an Epic must be present in Team

Name: Availability Constraint
Description: Employees must be available during Sprint period

Name: Location Constraint
Description: Teams must operate in same Time Zone

Name: Holiday Exclusion
Description: No Sprints start on public holidays

Name: Priority Feature Inclusion
Description: High-priority Features should be included in first two Sprints
